title: Will Allah forgive someone who commits zina of the eyes?
transcript: ruling on Xena of the eyes a person in his youth used to look at a lot of movies and pictures of women and now he is remorseful repenting and wants to know does Allah forgive him or her the answer is definitely yes whenever you repent sincerely whenever you express your remorse and you feel the fire burning in your heart because of that sin you had committed whenever you do good deeds and ask Allah for forgiveness rest assured that Allah Azza WA JAL would forgive your sins insha Allah Ta'ala
